title: It's FINALLY Back! Phanteks Enthoo PRO II
description: The Phanteks Enthoo Pro II is an airflow-focused update to the original Enthoo Pro that's based on the Enthoo 719 chassis.  Let's discuss price, availability and more while also looking at the new P500A which is a brand new mid tower case that can accommodate two complete desktop systems.    Thanks to Thermaltake, Phanteks, Razer and bequiet! for sponsoring our CES 2020 coverage.    Subscribe    Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #enthooproII #phanteksp500a #ces2020 #hardwarecanucks
